channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for PR

item.title: Report E-2024010361
item.description:
Report E-2024010361

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-22T15:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: GURABO
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A Veolia employee arrived on site at the 10-day intransit facility in Gurabo, PR and smelled an odor coming from a trailer. Upon investigation a spill was identified as coming out from the front of a trailer. Upon opening the trailer, the drum from Coppervision with a small hole at the lower section of the drum was discovered to be the source. The content of the drum seemed to be solidified and apparently it had a "pocket" of liquid on it.
